SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser.creator

Class Creator

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser.ToolUser
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser.creator.Creator
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreatorBigDoor, CreatorClock, CreatorDrawbridge, CreatorFlag, CreatorGarageDoor, CreatorPortcullis, CreatorSlidingDoor, CreatorWindMill
@ThreadSafe public abstract class Creator extends ToolUser
Represents a specialization of the ToolUser that is used for creating new AbstractStructures.
Author:
Pim

  • Nested Class Summary

    • constructStructureData

      Returns:

    • showPreview

      protected void showPreview()

    • prepareReviewResult

      protected void prepareReviewResult()

    • completeCreationProcess

      protected boolean completeCreationProcess()
      Completes the creation process. It'll construct and insert the structure and complete the ToolUser process.
      Returns:
      True, so that it fits the functional interface being used for the steps.

      If the insertion fails for whatever reason, it'll just be ignored, because at that point, there's no sense in continuing the creation process anyway.

    • giveTool

      protected final void giveTool(String nameKey, String loreKey)
      Adds the AnimatedArchitecture tool from the player's inventory.
      Parameters:
      nameKey - The localization key of the name of the tool.
      loreKey - The localization key of the lore of the tool.

    • giveTool

      protected abstract void giveTool()
      Method used to give the AnimatedArchitecture tool to the user.

      Overriding methods may call ToolUser.giveTool(String, String, Text).

    • completeNamingStep

      protected boolean completeNamingStep(String str)
      Completes the naming step for this Creator. This means that it'll set the name, go to the next step, and give the user the creator tool.

      Note that there are some requirements that the name must meet. See Util.isValidStructureName(String).

      Parameters:
      str - The desired name of the structure.
      Returns:
      True if the naming step was finished successfully.

    • setFirstPos

      protected boolean setFirstPos(ILocation loc)
      Sets the first location of the selection and advances the procedure if successful.
      Parameters:
      loc - The first location of the cuboid.
      Returns:
      True if setting the location was successful.

    • setSecondPos

      protected boolean setSecondPos(ILocation loc)
      Sets the second location of the selection and advances the procedure if successful.
      Parameters:
      loc - The second location of the cuboid.
      Returns:
      True if setting the location was successful.

    • confirmPrice

      protected boolean confirmPrice(boolean confirm)
      Attempts to buy the structure for the player and advances the procedure if successful.

      Note that if the player does not end up buying the structure, either because of insufficient funds or because they rejected the offer, the current step is NOT advanced!

      Parameters:
      confirm - Whether the player confirmed they want to buy this structure.
      Returns:
      Always returns true, because either they can and do buy the structure, or they cannot or refuse to buy the structure and the process is aborted.

    • completeSetOpenStatusStep

      protected boolean completeSetOpenStatusStep(boolean isOpen)
      Attempts to complete the step that sets the isOpen.
      Parameters:
      isOpen - True if the current status of the structure is open.
      Returns:
      True if the isOpen was set successfully.

    • completeSetOpenDirStep

      protected boolean completeSetOpenDirStep(MovementDirection direction)
      Attempts to complete the step that sets the movementDirection.

      If the open direction is not valid for this type, nothing changes.

      Parameters:
      direction - The MovementDirection that was selected by the player.
      Returns:
      True if the movementDirection was set successfully.

    • constructStructure

      protected abstract AbstractStructure constructStructure()
      Constructs the structure at the end of the creation process.
      Returns:
      The newly-created structure.

    • verifyWorldMatch

      protected boolean verifyWorldMatch(IWorld targetWorld)
      Verifies that the world of the selected location matches the world that this structure is being created in.
      Parameters:
      targetWorld - The world to check.
      Returns:
      True if the world is the same world this structure is being created in.

    • insertStructure

      protected void insertStructure(AbstractStructure structure)
      Takes care of inserting the structure.
      Parameters:
      structure - The structure to send to the DatabaseManager.

    • getStructureType

      protected abstract StructureType getStructureType()
      Obtains the type of structure this creator will create.
      Returns:
      The type of structure that will be created.

    • buyStructure

      protected boolean buyStructure()
      Attempts to buy the structure for the current player.
      Returns:
      True if the player has bought the structure or if the economy is not enabled.

    • getPrice

      protected OptionalDouble getPrice()
      Gets the price of the structure based on its volume. If the structure is free because the price is <= 0 or the IEconomyManager is disabled, the price will be empty.
      Returns:
      The price of the structure if a positive price could be found.

    • skipConfirmPrice

      protected boolean skipConfirmPrice()
      Checks if the step that asks the user to confirm that they want to buy the structure should be skipped.

      It should be skipped if the structure is free for whatever reason. See getPrice().

      Returns:
      True if the step that asks the user to confirm that they want to buy the structure should be skipped.

    • getValidOpenDirections

      public Set<MovementDirection> getValidOpenDirections()
      Gets the list of valid open directions for this type. It returns a subset of StructureType.getValidOpenDirections() based on the current physical aspects of the AbstractStructure.
      Returns:
      The list of valid open directions for this type given its current physical dimensions.

    • completeSetPowerBlockStep

      protected boolean completeSetPowerBlockStep(ILocation loc)
      Attempts to complete the step in the Procedure that sets the second position of the AbstractStructure that is being created.
      Parameters:
      loc - The selected location of the rotation point.
      Returns:
      True if the location of the area was set successfully.

    • completeSetRotationPointStep

      protected boolean completeSetRotationPointStep(ILocation loc)
      Attempts to complete the step in the Procedure that sets the location of the rotation point for the AbstractStructure that is being created.
      Parameters:
      loc - The selected location of the rotation point.
      Returns:
      True if the location of the rotation point was set successfully.

      Returns the cuboid of the structure that is to be created.

      The cuboid of the structure that is to be created or null if it has not been set yet.

    • getIsOpen

      protected final boolean getIsOpen()
      Returns the open status of the structure that is to be created.

      This may not have been set yet, in which case it defaults to false.

      Returns:
      The open status of the structure that is to be created.

    • getMovementDirection

      Returns:
      The power block of the structure that is to be created or null if it has not been set yet.

    • getFirstPos

      @Nullable protected final @Nullable Vector3Di getFirstPos()
      Returns the first position of the structure that is to be created.

      This is used together with a second position to construct cuboid.

      Returns:
      The first position of the structure that is to be created or null if it has not been set yet.

    • getPowerblock

      @Nullable protected final @Nullable Vector3Di getPowerblock()
      Returns the location of the power block of the structure that is to be created.
      Returns:

    • getWorld

      @Nullable protected final @Nullable IWorld getWorld()
      Returns the world in which the structure that is to be created is located.
      Returns:
      The world in which the structure that is to be created is located or null if it has not been set yet.

    • isOpen

      protected final boolean isOpen()
      Whether the structure that is being created is open.
      Returns:
      True if the structure that is being created is open, false otherwise.

      This may not have been set yet, in which case it defaults to false.

    • isLocked

      protected final boolean isLocked()
      Whether the structure that is being created is locked.
      Returns:
      True if the structure that is being created is locked, false otherwise.

      This may not have been set yet, in which case it defaults to false.

    • isProcessIsUpdatable

      protected final boolean isProcessIsUpdatable()
      Whether the process is in a state where is may be updated outside the normal execution order.
      Returns:
      True if the process is in a state where is may be updated outside the normal execution order, false otherwise.
